scripts.setup: bun i --no-frozen-lockfile && bun run --cwd ./Fliessheck build && bun run --cwd ./frontend build && bun i --no-frozen-lockfile && bun run --cwd ./backend build
scripts.lint: bun run lint:fliessheck && bun run lint:fe && bun run lint:be
scripts.lint:ci: bun run lint:fliessheck:ci && bun run lint:fe:ci && bun run lint:be:ci
scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:fliessheck" "bun run dev:fe" "bun run dev:be"
scripts.build: concurrently "bun run build:fliessheck" "bun run build:fe" "bun run build:be"
